scripts.build:all: yarn build:contract && yarn build:schema && yarn build:codegen && yarn build:compile
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn build:all && graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ amxx/compound-governance subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn build:all && graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ amxx/compound-governance-goerli subgraph.goerli.yaml
scripts.deploy:kovan: yarn build:all && graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ amxx/compound-governance-kovan subgraph.kovan.yaml
